General.Name: Shriram Properties Limited
General.Description: Shriram Properties Limited operates as a real estate development company in India. The company engages in the business of construction, development, and sale of housing projects. It develops residential projects, including mid-market and affordable, mid-market premium, and luxury housing projects, as well as commercial and office space, and plotted development projects in Bengaluru, Chennai, Kolkata, Coimbatore, and Vizag, India. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.
General.Address: Shriram House, No. 31, 2nd Main Road, Bengaluru, India, 560080
